Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Usage.description: Specifies the usage type for the certificate.
Usage.markdownDescription:
Specifies the usage type for the certificate.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: SIGNING | ENCRYPTION  
Update requires: No interruption

Certificate.description: Specifies the certificate body to be imported.
Certificate.markdownDescription:
Specifies the certificate body to be imported.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 16384  
Pattern: ^[	
 -ÿ]*  
Update requires: Replacement

CertificateChain.description: Specifies the certificate chain to be imported.
CertificateChain.markdownDescription:
Specifies the certificate chain to be imported.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 2097152  
Pattern: ^[	
 -ÿ]*  
Update requires: Replacement

PrivateKey.description: Specifies the private key for the certificate.
PrivateKey.markdownDescription:
Specifies the private key for the certificate.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 16384  
Pattern: ^[	
 -ÿ]*  
Update requires: Replacement

ActiveDate.description: Specifies the active date for the certificate.
ActiveDate.markdownDescription:
Specifies the active date for the certificate.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

InactiveDate.description: Specifies the inactive date for the certificate.
InactiveDate.markdownDescription:
Specifies the inactive date for the certificate.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Description.description: A textual description for the certificate.
Description.markdownDescription:
A textual description for the certificate.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 200  
Pattern: ^[\w\- ]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: Key-value pairs that can be used to group and search for certificates. Tags are metadata attached to certificates for any purpose.
Tags.markdownDescription:
Key-value pairs that can be used to group and search for certificates. Tags are metadata attached to certificates for any purpose.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.description: Specifies the unique Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the agreement.
Arn.markdownDescription:
Specifies the unique Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the agreement.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 1600  
Pattern: arn:.*  
Update requires: No interruption

CertificateId.description: A unique identifier for the certificate.
CertificateId.markdownDescription:
A unique identifier for the certificate.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 22  
Maximum Length: 22  
Pattern: ^cert-([0-9a-f]{17})$  
Update requires: No interruption

Status.description: A status description for the certificate.
Status.markdownDescription:
A status description for the certificate.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ACTIVE | PENDING | INACTIVE  
Update requires: No interruption

Type.description: Describing the type of certificate. With or without a private key.
Type.markdownDescription:
Describing the type of certificate. With or without a private key.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: CERTIFICATE | CERTIFICATE_WITH_PRIVATE_KEY  
Update requires: No interruption

Serial.markdownDescription:
Specifies Certificate's serial.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 48  
Pattern: ^[\p{XDigit}{2}:?]*  
Update requires: No interruption

NotBeforeDate.description: Specifies the not before date for the certificate.
NotBeforeDate.markdownDescription:
Specifies the not before date for the certificate.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

NotAfterDate.description: Specifies the not after date for the certificate.
NotAfterDate.markdownDescription:
Specifies the not after date for the certificate.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption
